goal.en: Introduction of the geometrical aberration for point object. And discuss the effect of aberration for the point object in the region of the diffraction optics.
goal.ch: 介紹點物在幾何光學上的像差成像，以及在繞射光學的基礎上討論像差對點物影像所產生的影響。

content.en:
“1. Geometrical-Optics- Based Imaging
2. Shift-Invariant Imaging
3. Imaging with Circular Pupils: PSF， Strehl Ratio， Aberration
Balancing， and Zernike Polynomials
4. Beam Focusing， Depth of Focus， and Aberrated PSFs
5. Imaging with Circular Pupils: Miscellaneous Topics
6. Imaging with Annular Pupils
7. Imaging with Gaussian Pupils
8. Random Aberrations“
content.ch:
“1. 幾何光學影像
2. 位移不變影像
3. 圓形孔鏡系統的影像:點擴散函數、像差平衡、斯特列爾比值、澤尼克多項式。
4. 光束聚焦、焦深、修正點擴散函數。
5. 環型、高斯孔鏡系統的影像
6. 隨機像差“

textbook.en: “Optical Imaging and Aberrations: Part I Ray Geometrical Optics. Optical Imaging and Aberrations: Part ΠDiffraction Optics.“
textbook.ch: “光學影像及像差:第一部幾何光學 光學影像及像差:第二部繞射光學“
